name: Koihime Enbu Ryorairai
overview: Koihime†Enbu ~Ryorairai~ (恋姫†演武 ～遼来来～) - also known as Koihime†Enbu Version 2 ~Ryorairai~ (恋姫†演武バージョン２～遼来来～), the third fighting game from the series of Koihime Musō. The arcade version was released on December 27, 2016. It also received a western localization for the PC and was made available on STEAM on July 13, 2018.
